Trade/Device Name(s): Teco Rapid Fecal Occult Blood (FOB) Card Test
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Teco Rapid Fecal Occult Blood (FOB) Card Test immunochromatographic assay to detect human hemoglobin in feces
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for determination of human hemoglobin in feces to aid in identifying gastrointestinal bleeding from sources such as colorectal carcinoma, colon polyps, diverticulitis, and ulcerative colitis; for routine exams, hospital monitoring, and colorectal cancer/gastrointestinal bleeding screening
